hymn.title: Good morning, Lord Jesus
hymn.category: Praise of the Lord—Satisfaction with Him

layout.singingstanza: Good morn -- ing, Lord Je -- sus, Thank You for to -- day. Thank You for my spir -- it, Thank You I can pray. Good morn -- ing, Lord Je -- sus, To You I love to sing. Thank You, Lord, for ev -- ery -- thing.

lyrics.stanza: Good morning, Lord Jesus, Thank You for today. Thank You for my spirit, Thank You I can pray. Good morning, Lord Jesus, To You I love to sing. Thank You, Lord, for everything.
